resources.string: Thank you for installing AppList Manager.\nYou can check out other apps we made by saying \"Vishnu\" to your echo remote.

string.name: hometxt2
string.ul:
To switch between Normal and Mosaic Layout make use of the button provided.\n
To set focus to the app search box use the Menu button.\n
To quickly go to top of list make use of the menu button, it shifts focus to the app search box.\n
When in app details screen use the menu button to open the app instantly.

string.name: last
string.b: Press Right DPad button to proceed/ Click here.
